mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO AS userNo, height AS height, weight AS weight, bmi as bmi, state AS state, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS date FROM USER_BMI WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 15
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_BMI( USER_NO, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, BMI, STATE, DATE )VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{bmi}, #{state}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %T') )
